Welcome to the Bag of Tricks for Astro's View Transitions

The bag of tricks provides components that demonstrate Astro's View Transition API. Some of these are technical demos, some are useful tools, and some will evolve into reusable components that you can use in your own project to handle edge cases that go beyond Astro's standard features.
